localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Appy Pie Chatbot Builder is a cloud based software that lets you create custom answer bots without any coding and add it to your website in minutes. Start with easy templates and customize your answer bot with an intuitive drag-n-drop interface. Get Started.
blogPost.body: Appy Pie Chatbot Builder is a cloud based software that lets you create custom answer bots without any coding and add it to your website in minutes. Start with easy templates and customize your answer bot with an intuitive drag-n-drop interface. Get Started.
blogPost.title: Appy Pie Chatbot - Create intelligent answer bots without any coding
blogPost.author: Samuel alex 🔥

localize.description: Appy Pie Chatbot Builder是一款基于云计算的软件，让您无需任何编码即可创建自定义的回答机器人，并在几分钟内将其添加到您的网站。从简单的模板开始，并通过直观的拖放界面自定义您的回答机器人。开始使用。
localize.tagline: 无需任何编码即可创建智能答题机器人

localize.description: Appy Pie Chatbot Builder是一款基於雲計算的軟件，讓您無需任何編碼即可創建自定義的回答機器人，並在幾分鐘內將其添加到您的網站。從簡單的模板開始，並通過直觀的拖放界面自定義您的回答機器人。開始使用。
localize.tagline: 無需任何編碼即可創建智能答題機器人

previous.excerpt: Scan anything: objects, people, pets, text, books, and documents. Scan Thing uses cutting-edge machine learning and computer-vision algorithms. You don't need internet access, an account, or a subscription. There's no data collection, no ads, and no nonsense.
previous.title: Scan Thing - Quickest way to capture and save anything around you

localize.description: 扫描任何东西：物体、人、宠物、文本、书籍和文档。Scan Thing 使用尖端的机器学习和计算机视觉算法。您不需要上网，不需要账户，也不需要订阅。没有数据收集，没有广告，也没有废话。
localize.tagline: 捕捉和保存您周围任何事物的最快速方法

localize.description: 掃描任何東西：物體、人、寵物、文本、書籍和文檔。Scan Thing 使用尖端的機器學習和計算機視覺算法。您不需要上網，不需要賬戶，也不需要訂閱。沒有數據收集，沒有廣告，也沒有廢話。
localize.tagline: 捕捉和保存您周圍任何事物的最快速方法

next.excerpt: Pika (pronounced pi·kuh, like picker) is an easy to use, open-source, native colour picker for macOS. Pika makes it simple to quickly find colours on screen, in the format you need, so you can get on with being a speedy, successful designer.
next.title: Pika - An open-source colour picker app for macOS

localize.description: Pika（发音为pi-kuh，像picker）是一款简单易用、开源的macOS原生色彩采集器。Pika让你在屏幕上快速找到你所需要的格式的颜色变得很简单，所以你可以继续成为一个快速、成功的设计师。
localize.tagline: 一款适用于macOS的开源颜色挑选器应用。

localize.description: Pika（發音爲pi-kuh，像picker）是一款簡單易用、開源的macOS原生色彩採集器。Pika讓你在屏幕上快速找到你所需要的格式的顏色變得很簡單，所以你可以繼續成爲一個快速、成功的設計師。
localize.tagline: 一款適用於macOS的開源顏色挑選器應用。
